label: science data
Description: primary data file for observations that contains the science data

label: coderived data
Description: output files produced along with this as additional or alternaticve product

label: calibration data
Description: primary file for observations intended for use in removing instrument signature

label: bias frame
Description: calibration file used to correct for CCD bias

label: dark frame
Description: calibration file used to correct for no exposure counts in a CCD readout

label: flat field
Description: calibration file used to correct for sensitivity variation across a CCD

label: related file
Description: file that could be useful in interpreting the primary file(s)

label: error map
Description: resource with array(s) containing error values

label: noise map
Description: file that provides noise estimates per pixel in the primary file(s)

label: weight map
Description: file that provides weights that can be used when analysing the primary file(s)

label: human-readable information
Description: extra information about the primary files (e.g. processing logs)

label: human-readable information
Description: extra information about the primary files (e.g. processing logs)

label: preview
Description: a degraded representation of the data useful for display and assessing content

label: preview plot
Description: a preview presented as a plot/graph

label: small preview image
Description: a highly degraded representation of the data suitable for displaying in a list
